code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[showDropdown,setShowDropdown]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const userData=localStorage.getItem('user');if(token&&userData){try{setUser(JSON.parse(userData));}catch(error){console.error('Error parsing user data:',error);}}},[]);const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');setUser(null);window.location.href='/';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-logo",children:"CzarCore"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/features",className:"nav-link",children:"Features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:"nav-link",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"nav-link",children:"Contact"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"profile-btn",onClick:()=>setShowDropdown(!showDropdown),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-pic",children:user.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:user.name})]}),showDropdown&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",className:"dropdown-item",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"dropdown-item logout",children:"Logout"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/auth",className:"nav-btn",children:"Sign In"})]})]})});}export default Navbar;
